title: idayam tirandu
sahitya:
idayam tirandu vENDum pOdu irakkam pirakkumA undan padattai ninaindu pADum enakkun manamirangumA


anupallavi

  nidamum varuttum vinaigaL tIrkkum upayam kiDakkumA inda akhilam unnai aruTkaDal enap-pugazhvadum poikkumA


caraNam    punita mantrAlayam ennum puramadil vaLar shImAnE analil mezhugu ena urugum avalam tIrkkum perumAnE
atishayam pallAyiram sheyum amala sundarA arum gati enakkundan kazhaliNai enum karuttum EikkumA
